website_summaries.verdict: You'll feel a real sense of pride with these high-quality Golf Pride grips.
pros: Slightly larger than standard-size grips but still ideal for smaller hands
The grips hold up wonderfully against rainy or sweaty conditions
These durable, nonslip grips will last for seasons
The non-tapered style provides excellent  grip pressure
cons: Come at a higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft but non-slip (in the rain) performance ... a winner!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite grips (MCC Plus 4); the color depends on other factors, like blue for blue shafts, grey for chrome or black graphite shafts ... I admit, color coordination is important to me. However, the grips, regardless of color, are outstanding. I just wish there cost less as I change them at least once a year ... this gets expensive ... some of my golf buddies buy new clubs rather than spend $$$ on new grips....
customer_reviews.author: Gerard T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sweaty hands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one to see if I liked it. I play golf in the south and sweat is definitely an issue. This grip is perfect for keeping a solid grip. I also like that there is little to no tapering off in diameter as you choke up on the club. I will be purchasing more for the rest of my irons. I had no problems installing the grip on my shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo grips = massive comfort
customer_reviews.text: For anyone one the fence on these grips- get them. I absolutely love them and have gripped my last half dozen sets with these. Once you decide on the grip, you need to consider the grip size. I used to use oversized. After a while, I developed an issue with overgripping too tightly. The jumbo’s helped fix this with a nice feel. Now a lot of my older friends are looking to switch out to jumbos to improve their hand comfort after playing way too much golf!!! Lucky guys!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shuey

customer_reviews.title: Great for different weather/temps
customer_reviews.text: Great grip for different weather/temps. The cord is good for extra grip and since it's only on the top half of the grip, no worries about it tearing up your skin(glove hand). I tried it on one club for a week and have now put them on my full set.
customer_reviews.author: First Timer Parents

customer_reviews.title: Tried it & liked it
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple of clubs needing grips. Checked Amazon and liked the look of the grips. Ordered and liked so much that I ordered 2 more times as other clubs needed grips. They are comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonville FL Girl

customer_reviews.title: I had to return them due to color
customer_reviews.text: I learned, you can't match color by looking at the listing. In the listing, the color is a yellow-orange that matches the shafts on my clubs perfectly. The order arrived and OMG, the grip color is a dark reddish orange that looks nothing like the picture. So I had to return them. But they look like nice grips if they would have matched.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grips
customer_reviews.text: Really nice feel, correct size for my hands, and look good. The markings on the grip help with hand and finger position when gripping the clubs which is essential to execute a quality golf shot. No signs of wear after several gold rounds. Good valve and will definitely purchase again. Ted V
customer_reviews.author: Ted V.

customer_reviews.title: Grip had strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I installed this grip on 3 clubs last week and I really liked them so I placed another order for one single grip for my 3 wood along with some other items. This new grip however had a strong chemical smell almost like wasp spray only worse? Nonetheless I installed it and attempted to thoroughly clean it with dawn dishwashing soap thinking the smell will dissipate over time but so far no change. It appears to be a genuine grip with original wrapping so I am wondering what changed between the two orders?
customer_reviews.author: Lalla

customer_reviews.title: No tackiness; slip in your hands.
customer_reviews.text: The grips feel tacky and gripable until actually putting it on the club. Once I regripped my clubs, grips lose all tackiness on the bottom hand and slip when hitting the golf ball. I washed them with soap and water, and still they slip. Had high hopes but they slip more than any grips I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Grip
customer_reviews.text: Really love this grip and have ordered replacements for all my clubs. I tend to be a bit "right handed" on my swing. The mid size with it's reduced taper which makes lower portion a bit larger has reduced my tendency to roll my right wrist on downswing. I have larger hands so if you use a regular grip it will still have the same degree of reduced taper for it's diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Surbs

customer_reviews.title: Genuine product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these grips for years, they are expensive because of the cord. I sometimes play without a glove and they never slip. If you see them for sale at a fraction of the cost it’s because they are counterfeit.9
customer_reviews.author: danimal

customer_reviews.title: Just a slight difference in feel. Probably enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a slight difference in feel. Probably enough to make a slight difference. Maybe it mental (like most of the game) but I sense I am able to produce a lighter grip with the lower hand.
customer_reviews.author: ces

customer_reviews.title: Real Golf Pride grip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased some on E-Bay and they are different than this one. This one smells like an auto tire as it should. Also the E-Bay conunterfits did not preform as well (straight shots down the fairway) as this one. This is a great grip, easy to install and has a great feel, like new clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Loranger

customer_reviews.title: Just like the golf stores
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of delivery. I’m not sure if it would is cheaper than the store but it is the same as what is available at the golf store. I had a family member install so I would say easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Doubts turned into perfect DRIVES
customer_reviews.text: Me a WINN lover Me no find perfect oversized grip for driver that added 1" shaft = harder to control Me got very lucky as this grip makes drives perfect finally Sadly the top portion wears down to SLIPPERY after 14 months
customer_reviews.author: tgiv

customer_reviews.title: Not real GolfPride.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these grips I noticed the color and lettering font was slightly different than my other Golf Pride grips, but just figured the product had been updated. After using them for a couple months I'm convinced these are counterfeit. I have the exact "same" grip on several of my clubs that are in much better shape even they are older and have seen more use. These grips have discolored and deteriorated much more quickly and are not up to Golf Pride standards.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: green grips rock
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very consistent feel on every stick. Use plenty of solvent when putting these on. I got a couple stuck, but recovered all of them. I replace grips each season and these are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: J D GOETTEE

customer_reviews.title: Best review
customer_reviews.text: Great grip. Easy install and I love the grip. Feels good, plays good. It is just too expensive. I would put them on every club i have, i just can't afford it.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Golf Club Grip
customer_reviews.text: I had the pro at my golf course install the grip. Since then, I have hit the ball squarely every time. Is the grip responsible???? Who knows>
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well with several rounds on a driver. Larger size makes the grip much more comfortable. No slipping with sweaty hands either.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Good grip, slightly larger then regular standard grips. But feel great and give great control and feel of the club
customer_reviews.author: Aeroreviews

customer_reviews.title: Golf Pride does it again
customer_reviews.text: These are the best golf grips that I have ever used. Lack of taper makes them feel like a mid size, but fit my hands perfectly. I did not install them but I’m assuming they aren’t that difficult
customer_reviews.author: John Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not for me
customer_reviews.text: These felt great in my hand but I have an issue with sometime pulling the bar, I went with the Plus 4 grips which help reduce the dreaded pull.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W Best

customer_reviews.title: Great grips
customer_reviews.text: I have only played with these a couple of rounds so I can’t say much for durability but they are very nice grips. I changed them myself with ease. I like the feel and they do have a strong gripping texture. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: This grip separated near the midway point after only 4 outings. Very disappointing, but I have to guess this was a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McParland

customer_reviews.title: Good grips
customer_reviews.text: Superior grips- daughter loves them and coach and pro club fitter recommended Brand new, so not sure how long they’ll last for an almost daily player
customer_reviews.author: dmscinkc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: With that 14 of them was maybe in the $60 range but this is by far my favorite grip
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: I'm a scratch golfer with these grips
customer_reviews.text: I think the extra diameter is helping my game by taking away the tendency to flip the clubbhead at impact.
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY K

customer_reviews.title: Golf Pride Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grips at an unbeatable price. Pretty cool having a 13 out of14 clubs with the same grips, sweet continuity.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Sonoma Marin

customer_reviews.title: Very secure grip
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable grip but gives a very secure grip even with wet or sweaty hands
customer_reviews.author: Minnie T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: .Priced right and came fast. Saved a bunch re-gripping my clubs in-house
customer_reviews.author: Shop2Much

customer_reviews.title: Feel is Very Important
customer_reviews.text: This grip feels very comfortable and secure in my hands. I've always like Golf Pride grips and was using the CP2 wrap before, but these feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf pride is Golf pride
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different brands of grips mostly cheaper than Golf Pride. However, I think Golf pride is the textbook of all the grips available in the market. Solid feel and durability distinguish its value.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Fake GP Grips
customer_reviews.text: Had my local golf shop install the grips and upon picking up, they asked how much I paid, which I responded with “how fake are they”. I play once a week and practice a few hours on the range, I suspect the wedges and low irons will last about two months and the rest will go in about three.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Opinions Matter

customer_reviews.title: Grip
customer_reviews.text: I feel very comfortable and am very satisfied with this grip after played 7-8 rounds since I replacad grips of all my woods and irons. I love it. My favorite old clubs are now all like new.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.I.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and a good grip, kind of pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Sherfy

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then expected. Was unable to install all the way on the shaft. Ended up cutting it off.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: I love the comford of this grip
customer_reviews.text: if you have big hands this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not for me
customer_reviews.text: Loved the grip, just not the jumbo part, went with the mid grips instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W Best

customer_reviews.title: These are nice, but I learned I really prefer the Wynn ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but I learned I really prefer the Wynn Dritacs due to their stickyness with or without a glove. This is a huge upgrade over stock, but just not tacky enough for my person taste.
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Best grip available
customer_reviews.text: Great grip. The Plus 4 dimension is great for the lower hand, in my case the right.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Hard to beat a golf pride grip.
customer_reviews.author: MDR

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made all summer
customer_reviews.text: I love these grips. I had no idea what I was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good grips. Handles humidity poorly.
customer_reviews.text: Grips are great but they don't do well in high humidity. Right hand slips a lot if I swing poorly and end up casting the club so these may not be great for someone in humid weather with an over the top tendency. Also wish they were a tad cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Amor

customer_reviews.title: No adhesive (or instructions)?  Useless without
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Had assumed the grip would come with adhesive. How do you install onto the club?
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grip. I bought them for all my clubs after trying this one.
customer_reviews.author: William Reape

customer_reviews.title: they ight
customer_reviews.text: 12 bucks a pop when i got them and they went on well and have a nice lined up look.
customer_reviews.author: trevor

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Grip
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite grips. Got red and they look sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best grips on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Best grips on the market. Even perform well when they’re wet. Have them on all clubs in my bag except for my putter. Recommend to all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grips
customer_reviews.text: Grips are the best and need to be replaced annually depending on your golfing. The Plus 4 is excellent if you have been building the grip under your right hand (RH golfer). Doing this reduces grip pressure by right hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ddelozie

customer_reviews.title: MY HUSBAND WAS PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: A LITTLE BIT HARD TO FIT BUT IT I S PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: dianBEL

customer_reviews.title: Favorite grip by far
customer_reviews.text: Favorite grip by far. Bit tougher to install than other all rubber grips (Tour velvet). Use a hair dryer to warm it up and it's easy DYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good grips
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand of grips before. I think they are good for the price range. This time I had one split on me the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: momsmit

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo grip is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel. Used it on my driver and definitely the thicker grip for me is so much more comfortable. Very easy to regroup a club with the proper kit and this one took me 10 minutes to do from start to finish. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Durable and doesn’t slip
customer_reviews.text: The grip is very durable. So far I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: cdpham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price. Way better than having to drive to Golf Galaxy and pay a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good grips
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works well when it is wet on the course.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schneider

customer_reviews.text: First time putting a new grip on a club. The kit and grip was slick.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K

customer_reviews.title: Love Em’
customer_reviews.text: Great feel wet or dry. Long lasting and look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M

customer_reviews.title: It's been great, it can be cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic, fit great does everything it needs to. I have found the same grip for cheaper in other places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Texas heat/humidity tested
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth it. Golf in Texas humidity is no longer an excuse.

customer_reviews.title: MMC Plus 4 grips
customer_reviews.text: I use these grips from Driver to Wedges!! They are great!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great grip. Toughens hands
customer_reviews.text: They're rough on the hands early in the season, but the grip is awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great grips. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time in new condition. Easy to install. I was playing with the new grips the next day. I am a fan of this style.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great grips, I love the extra thickness for the lower hand
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grip
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a year for me and I play 1-2 rds a week year round.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: God as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good as advertised. Replaced my old worn out grip, feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: PHome

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with a air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Use the air compressor trick and it’ll slide right on. It’ll take less than a minute, if not good luck you’ll look like a monkey with a football
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great grips
customer_reviews.text: Very good grips. I played in light rain and no slips at all. They feel very tight in my hands.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very good, I like them the best of all grips I have used
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Great grips decent value.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and is what you would expect from a golf pride grip. It was a decent value, I have seen them for more but I have also seen them for less. Over all happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: James D Edgett IV

customer_reviews.title: Grips
customer_reviews.text: Big jump from standard to mcc plus 4 but after getting use to it loving my new gross grips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Golf pride grips are easily the best grips on the market, bar none. Used mineral spirits to put the grips on, worked well. Definitely over saturate the tape to slide it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grips!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic grips! Midsize really does help me hold the club more comfortably for more control and distance.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have arthritis in your hands. Good quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.Shupe

customer_reviews.title: Best Grip!
customer_reviews.text: Had a little difficulty sliding it on. Otherwise this is my 2nd of this brand, my last one lasted several years, hoping this one does too!

customer_reviews.title: They have great traction and seem very durable
customer_reviews.text: These are "GRIPS" !!!! They have great traction and seem very durable.

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased with this unit and would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Item as described with fast shipping. I am quite pleased with this unit and would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Yup. This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Not a better jumbo grip on the market. True to size.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft and provide excellent gripping. I am ordering 5 more.

customer_reviews.title: New grips will improve your game
customer_reviews.text: Is the same as I have on my other clubs , added new wedges to my game, grips helped greatly

customer_reviews.title: Sticky not icky
customer_reviews.text: Grip feels great, I have small hands and it still feels like its on the larger size
customer_reviews.author: Bcells

customer_reviews.title: ... Plus4 is a non-tapered grip and it is just great on my wedges
customer_reviews.text: The MCC Plus4 is a non-tapered grip and it is just great on my wedges. When you chock up on the club the grip remains the same.

customer_reviews.title: Great grips!
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. I have played a few rounds with them now - and I love the full of the thicker right hand location. My old grips were pretty well worn and I could not ask for better replacements !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is perfect for humid and wet weather.

product_meta.title: Golf Pride MCC Plus4 New Decade MultiCompound Golf Grip
product_meta.description:
With a 4.6% larger outside diameter in the lower hand, the Plus4 encourages lighter grip pressure. Promoting less tension in the hands and more fluidity throughout the swing creates more power. 

MCC Plus4 has two uniquely formulated compounds to create the performance of two grips in one. The upper hand material is a soft compound with Brushed Cotton Cord for built-in stability. The lower hand contains a softer rubber compound ideal for enhanced feel.

With 80% of global Tour players trusting Golf Pride, nobody knows their grip preferences better than Golf Pride. The majority of Tour players build up their grips to reduce tension in their hands. With less tension comes more power and the most powerful swings in the game trust Golf Pride. Now we are bringing this performance preference to you with the new MCC Plus4. 

Features:


Larger Lower HandComposed of soft brushed cotton and rubber
feature_bullets: Larger Lower Hand, All-Weather Control, Maximum Surface Texture
Package Height Of The Item Is 6.0"
Package Length Of The Item Is 24.0"
Package Width Of The Item Is 13.0"
